title: Real-Life Game-Based Time Measurement Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic time unit comprehension (hours/minutes/seconds) and daily life experience
context.additional_context: Offline collaborative learning using personal devices (tablets/smartphones) in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Students can measure time intervals of 5 minutes using non-standard units (heartbeats, steps)
Learners can connect standard time units (minutes/seconds) with daily life activities
Students can design and apply time-measurement strategies in team-based games and analyze results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
